mapper.insert: insert into user_tb (email, password, username, nickname, birth, phone, created_at) values (#{email}, #{password}, #{username}, #{nickname}, #{birth}, #{phone}, now())
mapper.select: select * from user_tb where email = #{email} and user_role = 'USER';
mapper.update: update user_tb set nickname = #{nickname}, origin_file_name = #{originFileName}, upload_file_name = #{uploadFileName} where id = #{id}
update user_tb set username = #{username}, phone = #{phone} where email = #{email}
update user_tb set password = #{password} where id= #{id}
mapper.select: select * from user_tb where email = #{email} and user_role = "ADMIN"
select u.*, count(receiver) as msg_count from message_tb as m join user_tb as u on u.id = m.id group by receiver limit 6;
